Name: Plaka
Description: The old historical neighborhood of Athens, located under the Acropolis, known for its picturesque streets, traditional tavernas, and rich history.

Name: Monastiraki
Description: A lively neighborhood famous for its flea market, vibrant nightlife, and central location near historical landmarks such as the Ancient Agora and Hadrian s Library.

Name: Syntagma
Description: The heart of Athens, known for its grand square, the Greek Parliament, and being a major commercial and political center.

Name: Kolonaki
Description: An upscale neighborhood known for its luxury shopping, stylish cafes, and vibrant cultural life. It is considered one of the wealthiest areas in Athens.

Name: Psiri
Description: A trendy neighborhood with a mix of nightlife, artistic spaces, and a blend of traditional and modern architecture.
